author: dag
msg: DERBY-6689 Assert failure/NPE when using ROW_NUMBER in MERGE ... INSERT
Backported cleanly from trunk as:
svn merge -c 1616334 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk
Patch derby-6689. Adds checking for presence of window functions in
the matching clause nodes and throws 42ZC2 is that's the case. Adds a
test case.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-6565 ROW_NUMBER function throws NullPointerException in UPDATE statement
Backported cleanly from trunk as:
svn merge -c 1615982 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk
Patch derby-6565-forbid.diff which makes it illegal to use window
functions in the update source. Adds a new test for this error
condition. Also cleans up some Javadocs and modernizes some loops.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-6674 Cleanup brittle code in ValidateCheckConstraintResultSet
Backport from trunk as
svn merge -c 1614963 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk
Patch derby-6674. Refactors the code by reusing getNextRowCore (to
avoid the redundancy) for ValidateCheckConstraintResultSet but
abstracting out the loop control, which is overridden by
ValidateCheckConstraintResultSet.

author: markt
msg: Add all the necessary plumbing to use the code signing service. This is currently pointing at the test environment. It needs to be switched to production once that service is available.

author: uschindler
msg: Apply suggestions from Uwe Schindler for more secure xml defaults for #54764 and #56164, for xml parsers which support them
Add another test file for #54764, and a test that uses it
Change the default XMLBeans version used for running to be 2.6, leave 2.3 for compiling the schemas (for maximum compatibility)

Before parsing an OOXML document, reset the xmlbeans sax parser to avoid the risk of getting one in an error state (due to XMLBEANS-512). Should be a minimal extra overhead pending a proper fix. Allows us to finish enabling the unit tests for #54764
Correct xmlbeans 2.6 url
